title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Copilot documentation for Eclipse IDE in changelog.
Clarified SCIM setup user license consumption: `scim-admin` frees license after enabling SCIM.
Restructured client account management docs (enterprise/organization setup) with clearer prerequisites and steps.
Added note about 50-field limit in projects.
Added `release-assets.githubusercontent.com` and `api.snapcraft.io` to runner essential communications.
Updated GHES release dates file formatting.
summary:

- Clarified SCIM setup user license consumption: `scim-admin` frees license after enabling SCIM.
- Restructured client account management docs (enterprise/organization setup) with clearer prerequisites and steps.
- Merged renewal processes into `manage-client-org.md` and `manage-payment-info.md`.
- Added note about 50-field limit in projects.
- Added `release-assets.githubusercontent.com` and `api.snapcraft.io` to runner essential communications.
- Updated GHES release dates file formatting.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.

- Updated Copilot documentation for Eclipse IDE in changelog.
